resources.string: No location services. Monitoring has stopped.
No wireless connection. Monitoring has stopped.
No network/gps open. Monitoring has stopped.
Location is provided by GPS. That is the best option for monitoring the location if outdoors. Please if indoors connect to a wireless network \n
Location is provided by your wireless connection. That is the best option for monitoring the location if indoors. Please consider connecting to the GPS provider while outdoors \n
No known location services. Monitoring has stopped.
Your location services are disabled. Monitoring has stopped. Would you like to enable them and restart monitoring ? \n
You are not connected to a wireless network. Monitoring has stopped. Would you like to connect a network and restart monitoring ? \n
You must enable wifi (or preferably GPS if you are outdoors). Monitoring has stopped. Would you like to enable wifi and restart monitoring ? \n
Location is provided by GPS. That is the best option for monitoring the location if outdoors. Please if indoors connect to a wireless network \n
Location is provided by your wireless connection. That is the best option for monitoring the location if outdoors. Please consider connecting to the GPS provider while outdoors \n
Your location services are new to us. Monitoring has stopped. Please enable GPS or if indoors connect to a wireless network \n
